div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Aberdein' tenta in pretorio eiusdem
sexto die mensis Junij anno quo supra

The said day Johnne of Cullane forspekar for the wif of
Johnne of meldrum protestit that quhat margaret hay spous'
to the said Johne of meldrum proponit be hir foly and hasty
ansuer or said that It suld nocht turne Johinn' andirsoun'
heretar of that / land that the saide Johne meldrum has
in tak of the said Johne nor the said Johnn' meldrum
to na preiudice

The said It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
Williame blinsele forspekar anent the actioun'
debatable' betuix Johne chene of Essilmond one
that ane part and margaret hay spous to Johnn' of meldrum
and Johnn' of cullane hir forspekar one that vthir
that is to say that the said actioun' is continewit witht
consent of party to mononday eftir mydsomer
day the xxvij day of June nixt tocum and that day
tile haue ane decisioun' of ane assis' of thir personis
that is to say Johne lesly of Warderis alexander Red Johne
collisone Williame blindsele Williame chamer Johne
of Ratre gilbert menyhes Johne stevinsone thomas
Waus Dauy Kintor
and falyeing tharof In defalt of the said personis vthiris in
thar absence siclik the Richtis Ressonis and allegacionis
of baitht the partiis considirit and vndirstandin tile haue
ane decisioun' and the said margaret sal caus the said
Johne be that the said day And the hous' to be Inclusit
vnto that tyme the keis to be put in the commone' kyst

The said day the baillies continewit the actioun' and borght betuix
Williame serray litster and Williame chesame of thar awne
Autorite for waiknes of the court to friday that nixt cumis

The said day Johne of cullane forspekar for Williame
serray litster offerit him reddy tile vnderly the decisioun'
of ane assis' for ony thing that the said Williame chesame
had to say tile him anent the borght strekit one him be the
said Williame chesame and protestit that the continuacioun' maid
be the said baillies suld turne him to na preiudice sene
this day was assignit him peremptourly to ansuer to the said
borght and he was reddy tile vndirly the law tharfor

The said day Robert hendirsone offerit him Redy tile vnderly
the law In It that Johne steuinsone had to say to him considering
he Remanit quhile lauchfule tyme of day and na mane complenit
one him tharfor he protestit for his expens' costis and skathis
and that the said' Johne steuinsone suld' nocht be hard In Jugement
vnto the tyme he processit the said Robert with new process'

add.foreign: deposiciones testamentum inter thomam lesly et walterum saiffray

div.p:
Elizabetht bagerny the gret aitht suorne In presence of Walter
saiffra deponit that the gowne that he Intromettit witht
of blak pertening tile alexander Wilsoune was worth
in the tyme the he Intromettit with It xl s'

William gentilman deponis and concordis with the said
Elizabethtis deposicioun' in ale thingis

The said day Dauid symsone wobstar dischargit him of ale
feing and seruice of androw Wobstar and gif the said Androw licence to
gang to Johne Williamson' wobstar or tile ony vtheris quhome
he plesit to mak seruice

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem x die
mensis Junij anno quo supra

The said' day philp clerk belman at commavnd of the aldirman
and balyeis passit throw the haill tone and opinlie warnit ande
chargit al personis takismen of landis fischingis and wattiris
pertening to the tone or pretendand thame to haue ony takis
that thair comper one monunday that next Cumis befor thame
in the tolbutht bringand with thame thar girssomes that hes
nocht pait thame with Intimacioun' that thai that hed' pait suld'
haue thar takis and Assedacioun' selit / to tham Ande thai that wald'
nocht pay thar girssomes suld' nocht be put in the Assecacioun'
generale

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
gilbert menyes forspekar that the borghe' fundin one William
serray litstar be Williame cheishame that he aw to releyf
him of the fraucht Is of ij lastis of as' of nayn availl for the quhilkis
the saide William cheishame was in Ane amerciament of the court et cetera

The said' day gilbert tulidef oblist him be the fatht of his
bodie to Remoyve and expell ale vnlauchfule personis
beng' being' within his hous' be iiijor horis eftir nowne
and to caus' his wyf to ces' and decist fra hir Rebellinge and
blaspheming of ale personis hir nichtbouris and vthiris quhatsumere
Ande gif or his wif happinis to halde ony vnlauchfule personis
or to Rebell blaspheme or Inuvir' ony persone In tyme to cum
ande beis conuict tharof he or his wyf thane he oblist him be the
fatht of his bodie to pay fourty Schillingis to Sanct
Nicholes werk vnforgevin for the Recompensing and Amendis
of the trespas' done be hir tymez bigan'

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' gilbert
Menyes forspekar that gilbert prestone sale pay marion' Walcar'
the money that restis vnpait for hir' lande and Scho sal gif
hir' Seile and ger' sele his chartir

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiijo
die Junij anno quo supra

The said' day Alexander hay Offerit him redy to tak the Amendis
maid' to him in flandris apone Androw Meldrum

The said' day Androw meldrum warnit Alexander hay to cum to
morne to Sanct nicholes kirk and tak the Amendis diuisit
to him and the saide Alexander said' he walde haue na mendis
becaus' he gat It nocht In tyme

The saide day Jonhne Wormet saide he suld' ansuer' peremptourlie
one monunday the xx day of June Instant to the borghe' fundin
one him be William of chamer fra the wranguis' haldin fra him
of vj s'

The said' day comperit Dauid mar' sone and ayr to vmquhile thomas
mar' allegit that the demi nethis fischingis of the furdis quhilkis his
fadir and modir Josit was Sett to him as assignay and his girssome pait for the said'
tak and ix s' mair' tharfor he protestit for the said' tak sene the said'
day was Assignit tile al personis that hed' ony takis or pretendit
thame to haue ony takis of the tone to Comper and bringe thare
girssomes with thame that was vnpait And' atour the saide Dauid
mar' Offerit him redy tile vndirlie ane Inquest of xl personis of the
said' burghe gif he was habill and worthie to Joys' the saide tak or nocht
protestand for Remed' of law tym' and place quhar It efferit Apon' the
quhilkis the saide Dauy askyt Instrument witnes Dauy menyes Alexander
Rede g William chamer patry Rede Johne Annand' Dauy straloche
Johne falconer with vthir diuers' et cetera

The saide day Alexander Rede askit the deliuerance of ane Suorne assis'
of the Actione' dependand' betuix him and Wat Johnsone Anent
the tak of certane fischingis quhilkis was continevit to this day
and Johne Cullan gilbert menyes and thomas Waus offerit tham redy to
giffurtht thar' deliuerance with the Remanent of the hald assis'

Eodem die Alexander hay conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis
Cullane prelocutorem eiusdem per perturbio Curie quj emendabit ut Jura
volunt

Eodem die Alexander hay conuictus fuit per dictam assisam per perturbio
Willelmum chamer Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Alexander hay conuictus fuit per dictam assisam ex ore Johannis Cullan
prelocutorem per perturbio Andree meldrum cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Insuper ordinatus fuit per assisam quod dictus Andreas Alexander hay solueret decanis
gilde vj s' et octo d' pro dispersonacione confratrem gilde antequam accederet
de pretorio

Eodem die Johannes Kennertj conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis Cullan
prelocutorem eiusdem pro perturbio et dispersonacione Alexandri Rede Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes Kennerty conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ut super pro
perturbio mar' Relicte quondam mathei Cullan Cuj emendabit ut
Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes Duncanson' in Spittall conuictus per dictam assisam
pro perturbio Roberti prat et Idem Johannes pro perturbio Roberti scharp quolibet
emendabit ut Jura volunt et cetera

Eodem actiones querelose mote per Johannem malisone patricium Red
ac Infrictio plegiorum legalium quod Johannem Kennertj continuatur vsque ad
Sixtam proximam futuram in defectu testamentum

head.add: Plegij legales inter Kennertj lip et malyson'

div.p:
Eodem die thomas waus deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere ostendem
quod Johannes Kennertj erit Indempnis pro Symone lip aliter quam per viam Juris
Et patricius rede deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis
pro Johanne malison' aliter quam per viam Juris Et gilbertus menyeis deuenit plegius
legalis quod dictus Symon et Johannes malisone erunt Indempnes pro
dicto Johanne Kennertj aliter quam per viam Juris et dicte partes obligantur ad conseruandum
plegios suos Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

The saide day Androw meldrum was quyt of ale strubulance of Alexander
hay that he allegit was commyttit beyonde the sey be ane suorne
assis' Johne Cullane forspekar

The saide day Johne blak lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit to ansuer
to the borghe' fundin one him be Jonet litstar for the wranguis' occupeing'
and Intrometing of hald ane thridpart of ane Nethis fisching of the pott
tharfor the balyeis ordanit gilbert preston' officiar' to pas' and tak ane stres'
of the said' Johnz' and lat It Agan to the borgh and It be askit and warne him to
monunday the xxvij day of this Instant monetht of June as

Curia balliuorum de Aberdenn' tenta in pretorio eiusdem
decimo octauo xvijo die mensis Junij anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo secundo

The said day Dauid symsone wobstar grantit he had fyve elnis
of bradquhit pertening to William caldronhed quhilkis the ballies
chargit him to deliuer within terme of law

The said' day thir personis eftir writin Alexander menyes aldirman
Dauy menyes Androw Cullane Johne Colison Johne Cullan Alexander
chamer Alexander Rede Johne Knollis gilbert menyes James Colisone
thomas Waus patry leslie William chamer Johne Ratre Alexander
mar' Robert crag patry chernsid' Johne Waus patry Rede
Androw meldrum William Andirsone Dauy Adamsone Alexander King
Androw lousone and Williame murray diassentit to gif ony of Sanct
Nicholes gudis to sere Johne ruthirfurd' or tile ony vthiris And'
atour thai ordanit the aldirman to follow sere Johne ruthirfurd'
for thar commone gudis eftir the tenor of the procuratory gevin
to him vndir thar' common Sele quhilkis personis at commavnde of
the aldirman was Circualy Inquerit be the saide James Colison
ane of the balyes

Robertus blinsele Dauid menyes Johannes Cullan Alexander chamer
Andreas Cullane Johannes Knollis gilbertus menyes Willelmus chamer thomas
Waus patricius leslie Willelmus murray Alexander King Robertus
Crag Alexander mar Johannes Waus patricius chernsid' et Johannes
Retre burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus buchan
pater Isabelle buchane latricis presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus
vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem Domini nostrj Regis de terris et annuis Redditibus
subscripti Jacente infra dictum burgum videlicet de quadam terra Jacente in vico
castrali ex boreali parte eiusdem vicj inter terram Willelmum Kintor ex
orientali ex vna et terram altarum sanctj petrj ex occidentali partibus ab alteri
et communiones vias regias versus austrum et boream Et de vna
terra Interiore Jacente ex borealj parte eiusdem vicj inter terram
Andree litster et quondam Johannis Torreleitht ex orientali et terram
Johannis malisone ex occidentali cum libero Introitu et exitri Per
Portam Anteriore et terram anteriore Johannis Wormot versus
austrum et communiem viam regiam versus boream Et de vna alia
terra vasta Jacente in eodem vico Inter terram quondam Ade Arthere
ex occidentali et communiem viam regiam qua Itur ad montem castrj ex orientali
Et de quadam terra Jacente in le huksterraw ex australi parte
eiusdem Inter terram quondam Johannis huchosone ex orientali
et terram Johannis Cullane ex occidentalj Et de vno annuo
Redditu decim solidorum quondam Duncanj harpar in futy inter
terram alexandrj menyeis ex vastrali ex vna et terram Willelmi
Kymdy ex boreali De vno annuo duodecim denariorum de
terra Willelmum mateland in futy inter terram quondam Johannis fechat
ex australi et terram quondam thome prat ex boreali Et de vno annuo
Redditu vndecim solidorum de terra Donaldj strathachin Jacente
in vico superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vicj inter terram
quondam Willelmi nory ex orientali ex vna et Portam
ex occidentali partibus ab altera Et dicta Isabella est legittima et propinquior
heres dicti quondam Willelmi patris suj de dictis terris et annuis Redditibus cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis
Et quod dicte terre cum pertinenciis valent nunc per annum sex marcas et valuerunt quatuor marcas tempore
pacis vt quod dicte terre et annuj redditus cum pertinenciis tenetur in capite de suppremo domino nostro Rege
per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existunt in manibus domini nostri Regis per annum et aut eocirca
in defectu verj heredis Jus huiusque minime prosequentis'

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam mariota blinsele filia patricij Willelmi blinsele
latoris presencium obiit ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis Et quod
dictus Willelmus est legittimus et propinquior heres dicte quondam mariote
filie patricij suj Et quod est legittime etatis et cetera Ceteri puncti breuis
patent in se quia non fuit terre neque annuj Reddtus

The saide day Wat Johnesone at the ferybat of De was in Ane amerciament
of the court in the nayme of Jonhne honyson' for the wranguis' occupa
cioun of ane half nethis fischingis one the wattir of Dee pertening tile
Alexander Rede be ane Suorne assis' Williame blinsele forspekar and the
borghe' fundin be the saide alexander apon' the saide Johne houyson' for the
wranguis' occupacioun' of the said demi nethis fischingis was of wall

The said' day thomas Ridall Solemptlie protestit In presence of the
saide Inquest that quhat euere It happinnit thame to do in the
seruing of the breiwe of Inquest of the saide Isabell buchan turne
him to nay preiudice anent the hous' quhilkis he Inhabitis apon the
quhilkis he tuk Instrument of me sere Johne Stirueling notar witnes
the saide hall Inquest

The saide day maly frar was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' patry
leslie forspekar for strublance of gellys gray and the saide gelis was
conuict' for strubulance of the saide maly for the quhilkis Ilkan of tham
was in Amerciament of the court and to Amend as law will and forber' in tym to cum
and the prouocacioun was fundin in the saide maly and the assis' deliuerit and ordanit
gif euere scho committis ony sic strubulance In tyne to cum sche salbe expellit
the tone

The saide day cristy Walcar' was conuict be the saide assis' for strubulance of Jonet
Kinlocht and to Amend' as law will et cetera and the saide Jonet quyt of ale strubulance of
him

head.add: Pynoris conuict' for breking of common ordinance

div.p:
The saide day Duncan Ros' thome scot Johne orde and gelis gray
pynoris was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' patry leslie forspekar
for the brekin of common' Ordinance In takin of mair' money for
the bering' and careing' of the gudis within the tone thane Is extentit
and diuisit be the aldirman balye and Consall lang tymes Obefor

The said day Alexander Couper grantit him awand to ser Johne stirueling
iiijor s' fir his yard male quhilkis the ballies chargit him to pay within
Terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
die Junij anno quo supra

The saide day Syme layng was in ane Amerciament of the court be
his avne tonge grawnt for the distructioun' of the yerdis of the
towne with his schip and to Amend as law will and forber' in
tyme to Cum

The said day Cristy prat was in amerciament of the Court
be his awine tung grant for strublance of schir Johne striueling
clerk of the court in the court and tile amend as law will and forber In
tyme tocum and that was gevin for dome

Johannes Cullan Alexander chamer Andreas Cullan Alexander mar' Johannes Wormet Willelmus
Richardus Waus Willelmus blinsele patricius leslie Duncanus colison'
Johannes Retre patricius Rede thomas Waus Willelmus Kintor Willelmus
murray Johannes murray and Johannes Duncansone burgenses dicti burgi Jurati
dicunt quod quondam dominus Johannes Srathachin capellanus paternis Jonete strathachin latricis presencium obiit
vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri
regis de terris et annuo Redditu subscriptis videlicet infra dictum burgum
videlicet de quadam terra tam anteriore quam interiore Jacente in vico viridi ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter
terram thome gledstane ex orientali ex vna et terram Johannis Waus ex occidentali
partibus ab altera et Communionem viam regiam versus austrum et terram quondam Rogerj
Wirretaill versus boriam Et de quodam orto et domo Cum pertinenciis Jacente
in eodem vico inter Rivolum sine torrentem ad molendinum Inferius discendens
versus oriens et Cimiterium domus fratrem carmelitarum eiusdem burgi versus occidens
et Communes vias versus austrum et boriam Et de quadam terra J tam anteriore quam Interiore
Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam thome gilespy
ex australi et terram quondam Ade Andirson ex boreali et Communionem viam regiam versus oriens
et lat' dicti burgi versus occidens Et de vno annuo Redditu decim solidorum vsualis
monete scocie de terra presentis Alexandri logy Jacente in eodem vico ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter
terram Roberti blinsele versus oriens et occidens Et quod dicta Joneta est legittima et propinquior
heres dictis quondam domini Johannis patrij suj de dictis terris et annuo redditu cum pertinenciis Et
quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicte terre valent nunc per annum quadraginta s'
et valuerunt duas marcas tempore pacis Et tenentur in capite de domino nostro Re
ge per seruicium burgagium Et quod dicte terre et annuus Redditus cum pertinenciis nunc existiunt In
manibus domini nostri Regis per Spacium quatuor mensum aut eocirca In defectu verj heredis
Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis

The said day Comperit Johne Cullane befor the aldirman and balyeis allegeand' that Isabele buchan wes
his tendir Cosingage and that Dauid Colpe aucht nocht to be tutor tile hir considiring scho hed' diuerse
kynnismen one hir modir sid' quhilkis was worthie to reule and gouern' hir landis and gudis
an responsale tharfor Ande quhar he hede gottin ane tutory datiwe of our' Souerane lorde
of the said' Isabele be senister Informacioun he besocht the aldirman and balyeis that Caucioun'
mycht be takin of him that hir landis gudis and the profitis of thame mycht be furthtan ande to
hir and hir' nerrast and lauchfule ayris et cetera Ande thareftir the said' Dauid fande and set William Colp
his fadir Caucioune and Souerte to the aldirman and balyeis that the saide Isabellis landis and gudis salbe
responsale and furthtcumand' to hir' and hir ayris havande resone tharto quhene scho extendis the
age of tutory et cetera According tile our Souerane lordis lavis Ande the saide Dauid Oblist him
his landis and gudis to freitht and keipe his saide fadir skathles of the said' Caucioun' and Souerte
